reviewText:
We all wish we could just have fun and not get the consequences.  Here we get to see the "hero" have fun in the form of sex with several lovely, busty ladies.  There's no real plot, just opportunities for the protagonist to...have fun.

There is some lightweight fetishism...if you're into that, you'll likely find it disappointing.  My own response was along the lines of "huh?"  Then I hit fast-forward.

There is a mild consequence in that several of the women, including his wife, get pregnant, but this is dealt with as "isn't it odd that we all got pregnant at the same time?"

Entertaining but hardly thought-provoking.  Plenty good for what it's for.

Koichi and Kanami seem to be headed for a life of happy marriage. Yoichi is surrounded by many other women that are also very well endowed. He doesn't mind getting a lot of action on the side. Co-workers, neighbors, and even his sister-in-law are about to be part of his cantaloupe collection. By the time he's plowed through all these beautiful women, he'll have a lot more than he bargained for.

This is a typical hentai movie. The animation is top notch, but the story is thin as you expect. The voice acting is pretty okay as well. There isn't much to tell about this, but as far as hentai goes it's pretty descent.

Simply it's about one guy who just got married and becomes involved with several other women, whether they be who he works with, his wife's sister and others in the building he lives in. I bought this H-series after seeing clips of it online and absolutely needed to see more of what is was about. I enjoy this series and the 3ending his hilarious seeing all the girls all pregnant and his wife not knowing how it happened(LOL).  But anyway the DVD arrived nicely and no problems. The art work is really nice.

1st of all, throw the story out the window. It's just provides a quick, lazy reason for all the sex. The sex scenes are average (maybe a little better), and it's basically scene after scene with no real story worth a d@mn.
This title was okay, but it's the reason I'm reluctant to buy regular porn- I need a story with my entertainment!!!

It's a keeper, but if I hadn't purchased it before seeing it I probably would pass.  It's a coin toss.

I got this dvd in the mail today. This is about two newlyweds who happily married, Yoichi is eying any women with huge clevage,(neighbors, co-workers and even his sister-in-law) and all on a daily basis. During the 2nd part of this great dvd, he does the same thing to 5 other women (don't see in end of part 2). The ending is funny, Yoichi's life-parter, Kanami wakes up to find out that the women(in part 1 including Kanami) are all pregnant, and his wife has no idea how ALL of them got pregnant AT THE EXACT SAME TIME (It's a secret). I give this dvd a massive rating...(100 out of 100) a pefect score. i enjoy this dvd, I hope YOU will too.

What can you say, many of these shows fail to establish who is who as the main male goes about tasting the flesh of various females while his wife is at home. In one way or another all of these ladies are related, and so therefore it makes it ok even though they are married to make sure that they are satisfied. The action is pretty good, but the wife, and the mother (not biological) are truly as the old saying goes one hot mama. In the end his exploits shows the fruits of his labor in that all of them are pregnant and the poor wife is clueless, but everyone is happy not a depressing ending. It is a fun one to watch, however the only part that left a little to be desired is the widow who is handled by the father in law and the son. Could have left that out, or had the male take care of her.
